beans.staff

Interface ManagePatientByStaffBeanLocal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagePatientByStaffBean

    public interface ManagePatientByStaffBeanLocal
    Document: ManagePatientByStaffBeanLocal Version: Jan 20 2017 Author : Marufa Chowdhury, Rachel Bautista, Mamadou Diallo, Tuan L. Truong, Rodney Vencio Description: Interface to define the methods for editing a staff account, deactivating a staff account reactivating a staff account and deleting a staff account.
